description.raw:
Changes in sdformat to support proper debian guidelines. From the top of my head:

 * Split package into: libsdformat1 (ABI will be keep between minors) and libsdformat-dev  
 * Proper copyright file (DEP-5)
 * New libsdformat1-dbg (using DebWithRelInfo to build)
 * All ubuntu distros share the same debian metadata (except changelog)
 * Runtime dependencies are handled via shlibs
 * Support for parallel building

This will serve as early work to back to gazebo transition. My plan is to start building nightly using this scheme and change gazebo dependencies to look for ```libsdformat1 | sdformat```.

Thanks to @thomas_moulard who inspired this work and I'm sure will provide good feedback on this.

  • Proper copyright file (DEP-5)
  • New libsdformat1-dbg (using DebWithRelInfo to build)
  • All ubuntu distros share the same debian metadata (except changelog)
  • Runtime dependencies are handled via shlibs
  • Support for parallel building

This will serve as early work to back to gazebo transition. My plan is to start building nightly using this scheme and change gazebo dependencies to look for libsdformat1 | sdformat.

Thanks to @thomas_moulard who inspired this work and I'm sure will provide good feedback on this.
